sdapy.read_default.get_parameters¶

sdapy.read_default.get_parameters(filename='default_par.txt', wdir=None, verbose=False, return_comments=False, return_type=False, keylist=None)¶

get default parameters for each SN

Parameters
filenamestr

file name

wdirstr

data directory, if None, will be set as HAFFET default data directory, i.e. $ZTFDATA

verbosebool

show report

return_commentsbool

if True, return comments of each parameters

return_typebool

if True, return types of each parameters

keylistlist

if specified, return those demanded keywords

Returns
default_infosdict

HAFFET
